Constructor Detail

RequestResponse

public RequestResponse()
Constructs an instance of the RequestResponse class. The RequestResponse object is used to communicate a client's request to the server, and for the server to return it's response back to the client.

RequestResponse

public RequestResponse(java.lang.String methodName,
                       java.lang.Object[] arguments)
This constructor is used by the client app to form a request to the server app. The client specifies the name of the server's service and arguments to pass the service.
Parameters:
methodName:Ljava.lang.String - is the name of the service to invoke on the server.
arguments:[Ljava.lang.Object - array containing parameter values to pass to the server's service.

RequestResponse

public RequestResponse(java.lang.Object returnValue)
This constructor is used by the server app to return a response to the client app which sent the request. The server encapsulates it's response in this object as an answer to the client's request.
Parameters:
returnValue:Ljava.lang.Object - used to encapsulate any information for the server's response to the client's request.
